保安更新

Security updates

Security updates

系統微調及性能改善

Minor updates and performance improvements

支援 iOS 11及允許iPhone X 使用Face ID 認證

Support iOS 11 and allow Face ID authentication for iPhone X

客戶可透過此程式進入東亞銀行證券服務手機程式，體驗更快更簡易之股票交易。

Customers can access BEA Securities Services App through this app for faster, simpler stock trading.

支援信用卡電子結單推送通知服務

Support credit card e-statement push notification

系統微調及性能改善

Minor updates and performance improvements

更新信用卡頁面

Credit Card page updated

此版本新增「i-Planner」- 結合生活及理財之智能平台，提供精彩旅遊優惠及當地熱點推介。

This version introduces “i-Planner” – a virtual hub that integrates daily living needs with financial transactions, offering fabulous travel offers and on-the-spot recommendations.

為加強東亞銀行手機程式的安全性，東亞銀行手機程式只可在iOS版本10或以上使用
The BEA App can only be used on devices with iOS version 10 or above.

此版本新增「i利是即時抽獎」 - 此抽獎於2019年2月5日至19日舉行，獎品總值超過HK$100,000！
This version introduces “i-Laisee Instant Lucky Draw” – The lucky draw opens from 5th to 19th February, 2019, offering prizes with a total value of over HK$100,000!
